Main
================================================================================


Nathan L. Brouwer Phd {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Data scientist specializing in complex ecological data

I am an ecological data scientist and educator with 15 years of experience extracting insights from messy data and communicating the results.  I specialize in using generalized-linear mixed models (GLMMs) to analyze data from long-term observational studies.  I have also taught myself key aspects of bioinformatics, phylogenetics, machine learning and population genomics. </br> Note - All blue text is hyperlinked to relevant online materials.
